activities: Employee information is processed from our Swiss office in the U.S. for Human Resources purposes.  Clinical trials in the EU/EEA include personal information that is processed in the U.S. in our Home Office.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Employee data and clinical trial data.
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: Our Office of Compliance will diligently investigate and resolve complaints concerning compliance with our Safe Harbor policy.  We have also agreed to participate in the dispute resolution program provided by the European Data Protection Authorities Panel and to cooperate and comply with the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland.
